org.onehippo.forge.repository.connector.remoting.davex

Interface HippoJcrRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.hippoecm.repository.HippoRepository, javax.jcr.Repository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LazyHippoJcrRepository

    public interface HippoJcrRepository
extends javax.jcr.Repository, org.hippoecm.repository.HippoRepository
    Merged interface from javax.jcr.Repository and org.hippoecm.repository.HippoRepository for convenience. You can use both interface by defining only one JNDI resource by using this type and org.onehippo.forge.repository.connector.remoting.davex.DavExHippoRepositoryBasedHippoJcrRepositoryFactory.
